title: NEON Sites

table:columns.description: site identifier

table:columns.description: details for accessing the field site

table:columns.description: easting UTM coordinates

table:columns.description: UTM zone for field site

table:columns.description: state where field site is located

table:columns.description: country where field site is located

description: This collection contains information to describe the NEON sites included in the forecasting challenge

publications.citation: Thomas, R.Q., C. Boettiger, C.C. Carey, M.C. Dietze, L.R. Johnson, M.A. Kenney, J.S. Mclachlan, J.A. Peters, E.R. Sokol, J.F. Weltzin, A. Willson, W.M. Woelmer, and Challenge Contributors. The NEON Ecological Forecasting Challenge. Accepted at Frontiers in Ecology and Environment. Pre-print
